name: Dreamgeon Wanderer
description:
The Dreamgeons are dangerous labyrinths out of time and space scattered throughout the world of Ednom. Your goal: to conquer them!

Alternate between this world and the dream world to solve the riddles and obstacles that will appear before you: rescue the trapped villagers and above all escape from this dark place to find the sweetness of your bed. Use your ingenuity to solve the puzzles and defeat your evil enemies! Hopefully it will be as easy for you to do it as it is for us to tell it. But this will only be the beginning of your adventure, because many dreamgeons are waiting for you. 

See you soon in Dreamgeon Wanderer!

Developped by Antoine BOULANGE, Carla FABOUMY, Camille LAVARDE, Aubane LECORCHET and Cyril PERIER.

Special thanks to Mr. Rabah Syphax Benaoudia for his huge help and support and Kay Lousberg (https://kaylousberg.itch.io/) for his awesome assets !
